channel.title: Dodian?
channel.description: So what is dodian? i know it was a old RSPS what happen to it i donated for premium like 2 years ago and now its down and renamed dodian wars can anybody tell me what happen?

item.title: Dodian?
item.dc:creator: @Statik97 Statik97
item.description:
@Statik97 wrote:

They took it down cuz it was selling premium

Read full topic

item.title: Dodian?
item.dc:creator: @I_Yaa_I I Yaa I
item.description:
@I_Yaa_I wrote:

mr arrows95:

So what is dodian? i know it was a old RSPS what happen to it i donated for premium like 2 years ago and now its down and renamed dodian wars can anybody tell me what happen?

Dodian was an extremely unique server. It was old school, and extremely custom, not like everyone’s crappy deltas. It got shut down by Jagex for selling ‘premium’.

Read full topic

item.title: Dodian?
item.dc:creator: @B2300_T4nk B2300 T4nk
item.description:
@B2300_T4nk wrote:

[quote=“Explisionist, post:17, topic:313064”][quote author=B2300 T4nk link=topic=409574.msg3023825#msg3023825 date=1257744372]

There was a topic on runescape forums about 2speced like a month or two ago… I was searching spec for specials and it popped up… A jagex mod posted in it saying they had someone working for them on their staff team and recording everything they do… He said it might be shut down very soon if they didn’t stop.

I hope it happens.
[/quote]THEY SHOULD HAVE ALREADY CLOSED IT.

They had no legal proof, since the transactions took place over msn or over ventrilo?[/quote] Pfft.

Read full topic
